dct_title_s: Map to illustrate the offensive of the St. Mihiel salient
dct_description_sm: Shows region between St. Mihiel and Metz.; Base map: St. Mihiel salient.; "To accompany report of the Commander in Chief, November 20, 1918."; Accompanied by mimeographed index: History of the St. Mihiel Salient : index. 6 leaves ; 31 cm.; Stamped on: Summerall papers.
dcat_keyword_sm: Saint Mihiel, Battle Of, Saint Mihiel, France, 1918
